English: Use maintenance terminal command PING to find [ITEM_SERIAL]
Description: A short summary of a mission objective. Don't alter the "[ITEM_SERIAL]" part, just put it in the gramatically correct position in the sentence. "PING" is a computer terminal command and should NOT be translated.

French.Translation: Utilisez la commande PING du terminal de maintenance pour trouver [ITEM_SERIAL].

Italian.Translation: Utilizza il comando SEGNALA del terminale di manutenzione per trovare [ITEM_SERIAL]

German.Translation: Nutzen Sie den Befehl "ping" des Wartungsterminals, um [ITEM_SERIAL] zu finden.

Spanish.Translation: Usa el comando PING en la terminal de mantenimiento y encuentra [ITEM_SERIAL].

Russian.Translation: Используйте команду терминала PING, чтобы найти предмет ([ITEM_SERIAL]).

Portuguese_Brazil.Translation: Use o comando MARCA no terminal de manutenção para encontrar [ITEM_SERIAL].

Polish.Translation: Użyj polecenia PING w terminalu serwisowym, aby znaleźć [ITEM_SERIAL].

Japanese.Translation: メンテナンス端末のPINGコマンドを使用して [ITEM_SERIAL]を見つけろ

Korean.Translation: 유지관리 터미널 명령어 PING을 이용해 [ITEM_SERIAL] 찾기

Chinese_Traditional.Translation: 使用維護終端指令PING尋找[ITEM_SERIAL]。

Chinese_Simplified.Translation: 使用维护终端命令PING找到[ITEM_SERIAL]。

name: WardenObjectiveData.SpecialTerminalCommand_Override.InZoneFindItemHelp
